name: Quicken Spell
description: You can cast a spell as a bonus action.

name: Empower Spell
description: When you roll damage for a spell, you can choose to reroll a number of the damage dice up to your INT. You must use the new rolls.

name: Twinned Spell
description: When you cast a spell that targets only one creature and doesn't have a range of self, you can target a second creature in range with the same spell. You reroll hit and damage rolls for the second target

name: Reckless Magic
description: You can choose to take disadvantage on your spell attack roll to gain advantage on the spell's damage roll.

name: War Caster
description: When you take damage, you gain advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on a spell. When a hostile creature moves out of a 5ft radius from you, you can use your reaction to cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action on that creature as the target.
